Introduction

Koga Yudai, known under his stage name K, is a Japanese singer and dancer under HYBE Labels Japan. He is best known as the performance leader, main dancer, and vocalist of the Japanese boy group &TEAM.

K is best known for participating in the survival program I-LAND–the same show where ENHYPEN was created. However, K was eliminated on the final episode. In 2022, K participated in the survival show "&AUDITION - The Howling -" where he qualified to join the Japanese boy group &TEAM.
